allPosts.title: At the Sign of the Prancing Pony
allPosts.excerpt: The Hobbits reach the The Prancing Pony inn at Bree, where Frodo uses a false name, Underhill.

allPosts.title: A Long-expected Party
allPosts.excerpt: Gandalf arrives in the Shire for Bilbo's Farewell Birthday Party. Bilbo leaves the Shire permanently.

allPosts.title: The Riders of Rohan
allPosts.excerpt: Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli follow the trail of the Orcs and find several clues as to what happened with Merry and Pippin.

allPosts.title: The Passing of the Grey Company
allPosts.excerpt: Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli are accompanied by the Grey Company as they pass through the Paths of the Dead between Rohan and Gondor.
